== Tux Paint ==
* Tux Paint is an award-winning drawing program for children, particularly those between 3 and 12. 

== Key Features ==
* See '''<nowiki>[[http://www.tuxpaint.org/features/|this webpage]]</nowiki>''' for Tux Paint's features.

== Screenshot ==
<nowiki>[[File:tuxpaint-screenshot-400px.png]]</nowiki>

== Installation ==
To install this software, simply <nowiki>[[InstallingSoftware#installing-a-package|install the following package]]</nowiki>: '''''<nowiki>[[apt:tuxpaint|tuxpaint]]</nowiki>'''''. 

The stamps package should be installed automatically. If it hasn't install '''''<nowiki>[[apt:tuxpaint-stamps-default|tuxpaint-stamps]]</nowiki>'''''.

Optionally you can also install '''''<nowiki>[[apt:tuxpaint-config|tuxpaint-config]]</nowiki>'''''.

== Hints and Tips ==
You can start tuxpaint from '''''<nowiki>[[apt:gcompris|gcompris]]</nowiki>''''' as well if you have installed it.

If you want to open your saved drawings outside the program you can find them in your home folder. Open your home folder, select view - show hidden files. Open the .tuxpaint folder and you'll find your paintings in saved. (~/.tuxpaint/saved)
